dialogues.speaker: cat
text: (I wonder what this music playing is?)
It's a song called 'Cool Cat' by Meowtastic~ It's a rock song, doesn't it make you excited?
야옹시대의 멋진 고양이라는 곡이에요~ 락음악이라 신나지 않나요?
It's a song called 'Love, cat' by Meow Kim~ Don't you think Meow Kim's voice suits ballads so well?
야옹킴의 러브캣이라는 곡이에요~ 야옹킴의 목소리가 발라드에 너무 잘 어울리지 않나요?

dialogues.speaker: cat
answer: Cool cat... I like it. (I feel like I'd become a cool cat too if I work while listening to this.
멋진고양이... 좋네요.(이걸 들으면서 일하면 나도 멋진 고양이가 될 것 같군.
Love, cat... I like it. (Nicely captures the heart of a separated cat. I should save this.)
러브캣... 좋네요.(이별한 고양이의 마음을 잘 표현했군. 저장해야지.)
